Used Clean code pratices and strictly adhere to  [./instructions/clean-code.instructions.md](./instructions/clean-code.instructions.md)

Used Java REST API conventions as mentioned in [./instructions/java-rest-api.instructions.md](./instructions/java-rest-api.instructions.md)

Follow strictly java coding conventions as mentioned in [./instructions/java-instructions.md](./instructions/java-instructions.md)    

Follow logging best practices as mentioned in for any new code you generate [./instructions/logging.instructions.md](./instructions/logging.instructions.md)

For making http calls always use Feign client and Refer to [./instructions/FEIGN_CLIENT_CONVENTIONS.instructions.md](./instructions/FEIGN_CLIENT_CONVENTIONS.instructions.md) in this repo for full examples (RequestInterceptor, DomainErrorDecoder, Resilience4j wrapper, WireMock tests). That file is the source of truth. DO NOT USE ANY OTHER HTTP CLIENT.

For secure coding practices, follow [./instructions/security-owasp.instructions.md](./instructions/security-owasp.instructions.md) in this repo.
